r.s: Validation class for ISPN (International Standard Product Numbers)
r.d: Package containes ISPN (International Standard Product Numbers) validations such as: * ISSN * ISBN * ISMN * ISRC (International Standard Recording Code) * EAN8 * EAN13 * EAN14 * UCC12 * SSCC
r.n: - ISRC (International Standard Recording Code) added by the courtesy of David Grant [david at grant dot org dot uk] - ISBN13 added, the isbn() function is used at all times and will figure out if it should validate against isbn10 or isbn13 - Piotr Klaban added as lead
